261846.「……ずっと 本当のこと 言えなかった。\n 言ったら 兄さんがこわれてしまうと:
I couldn't tell you the truth for a long time.
I thought it would destroy you.

261847.「でも 結果として 兄さんを\n ひどく キズつけて 追いつめてしまった。\n:
But as a result, I hurt your brother badly and
pushed him too far. Because I didn't have the
courage...

261848.「兄さんは あのとき 私を守ってくれた。\n だから 今度は私の番よ。\n 私が:
You protected me then. So now it's my turn. I
will save you.

261849.「……お父さんとお母さんを 刺したあと\n 兄さんは 私にもナイフを向けた。\n:
After he stabbed Mom and Dad, he pointed a
knife at me too. I thought, "I'm going to die
here, too.

261850.「でも 兄さんは 直前で踏みとどまったの。\n 歯を食いしばって 涙を流して……:
But he held on just in time. He gritted his
teeth, shed a tear... and the knife grazed his
face, but it didn't kill him.

261851.「私を守るために 兄さんは……\n ウィーヌムの毒と 戦ってくれた。:
To protect me, your brother fought against
Wienum's poison.

261852.「あのとき 兄さんが \n 絶望に 負けないでくれたから\n 私は 今 こうして:
I am alive today because my brother did not
give in to despair at that time.

261853.「だから お願いよ 兄さん……。\n これ以上 絶望に飲まれないで。:
So please, brother... don't let despair
consume you any longer.

261859.「私ひとりでは 兄さんを救えない。\n 同じように痛みを知る あなたにしか頼めな:
I can't save your brother by myself. I can
only ask you, who knows the pain as well as I
do. You must shatter his despair.

261864.「今は 何も言わないで。\n 私はずっと 兄さんのそばにいる。\n もう ひとり:
Don't say anything now. I will always be with
you. I won't let you suffer alone anymore...

261865.「……おかえりなさい 兄さん。\n 戻ってきてくれて ありがとう。:
...Welcome back, brother. Thanks for coming
back.

261866.「<cs_pchero>さんも 本当にありがとう。\n あなたがいなかったら ど:
Thank you so much for <cs_pchero> too. I
don't know what I would have done without you.

261867.「……さあ つるぎの酒場に帰りましょう。\n そこで 改めてお礼をさせて。:
Come on, let's head back to the tavern.
I'll thank you again there.

261868.「改めて……<pc>さん\n 兄さんを……私たちを救ってくれて\n 本当にありが:
Once again...<pc>Thank you so much
for saving my brother...and us.

261869.「ウィーヌムも死んで もう無闇に\n ダークネスが現れることは なくなった。\n:
Now that Wienum is dead, there is no more
darkness showing up unchecked. For now,
Lendersia can breathe a sigh of relief.

261870.「これは 私たちふたりからの 感謝の気持ちよ。\n 受け取って。:
This is a token of our appreciation from both
of us. Received.

261872.「お前がいなかったら 俺は\n 絶望を 振り払うことができなかった。: Without you, I couldn't shake off my despair.

261873.「……絶望の毒に 我を失っていたとはいえ\n 俺が犯した罪は 決して消えない。\:
...Though I was blinded by the poison of despair, the crime I committed will never be erased. The day of my forgiveness will never
come.

261874.「いっそ 死んでしまえたら……\n 永遠の苦しみから 逃げ出せたならと\n 深い:
I wished many times in the deep darkness that
I could just die... that I could escape from
eternal suffering.

261875.「そんなとき お前たちの声が聴こえて\n 帰りたいと……みんなと共に\n 生きて:
Then I heard your voices and I wanted to go
home... to live with you all...

261876.「だが そんなことを 願ってもいいのだろうか。\n 父さんと母さんを 殺した俺が:
But is it right to wish for such a thing? I
killed my father and mother, and I don't want
to live.

261877.「お父さんとお母さんは\n 兄さんに 死んでほしいなんて\n 思っていないわ。: Your mother and father don't want you to die.

261878.「覚えていないかも しれないけど\n ふたりは最期の瞬間 兄さんを抱きしめたの。:
You may not remember, but in their last
moments together, they embraced. I was trying
to save my little brother from despair.

261879.「ふたりとも 本当に 兄さんを愛していた。\n あなたに 生きてほしいと願ってい:
We both really loved your brother. They wanted
you to live. That was your father and mother's
last wish...

261880.「罪が許される日は 来ないのかもしれない。\n それでも ふたりのために 生きて:
The day may never come when your sins will be
forgiven. Even so, I want you to live for both
of us. I will bear it with you.

261882.「俺は もう逃げない。残りすべての人生をかけて\n 父さんと母さんへの 罪の償い:
I will not run away anymore. I will spend the rest of my life to atone for the sins of my father and mother and fight as a Demon
Swordsman for those who suffer from despair.

261884.「……ありがとう <pc>。\n お前に会えて よかった。:
...Thanks <pc>. It was nice to meet
you.
